byline: Queena Kim, David Gura, Steve Gardner, Mark Garrison, Noel King, Rob Schmitz and Sabri Ben-Achour
title: Marketplace for Tuesday, September 17, 2013
description: The secret of Gap success as the best-performing public apparel company this year; why Janet Yellen wasn't first choice for Fed Chair; and a popular backlash as Super Bowl ticket prices reach nosebleed heights.
teaser: The secret of Gap success as the best-performing public apparel company this year; why Janet Yellen wasn't first choice for Fed Chair; and a popular backlash as Super Bowl ticket prices reach nosebleed heights.
